item.title: FIX: Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock' (2)
item.description: Quick post today. This is more for my reference than anything else, but maybe some other soul on the web will need this info. I recently installed the LAMP stack on my Linux Mint distro. Getting mysql to start was a struggle. The main terminal error was: Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock' (2). I went through several Stack Overflow questions and none of the solutions were working out for me.
